text: Liza Solo (born 27 September 1997) is a Solomon Islands women's footballer who plays as a defender for Koloale. ==Career== Solo made her international debut for the Solomon Islands on 24 August 2018, starting in the 2018 OFC Women's Nations Cup qualification match against American Samoa. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|Solomon Islands |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2018||3||0 |- !Total!!3!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Profile at oceaniafootball.com Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Solomon Islands women's footballers Category:Solomon Islands women's international footballers Category:Women's association football defenders
title: Liza Solo
